Youth

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”banner-sub-title” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_line_height=”1em”]He korero mo ngā Rangatahi! – For Young People![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ background_enable_color=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.9.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_css_before=”width: 175px;||height: 507px;||content: ”;||background-image: url(/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/You-Left-Col-doodle.png);||position: absolute;||left: -210px;||top: -6px;||background-size: cover;”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Title” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#4b858e” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#4b858e” header_2_font=”|300|||||||” header_3_font=”Zooja Pro|100|||||||” header_3_text_align=”center” header_3_text_color=”#cccdce” header_3_font_size=”82px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-0.1px” header_3_line_height=”0.8em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||50px||false|false” custom_padding=”||50px||false|false” header_3_font_size_tablet=”50px” header_3_font_size_phone=”40px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” border_width_bottom=”1px” border_color_bottom=”#bfbdbd” border_style_bottom=”dashed”]

Kia ora, talofa lava, bula, salaam alaikum, Malo e lelei. hey there…

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Quote” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ header_4_font=”fun|300|||||||” header_4_text_align=”center” header_4_text_color=”#BF9A46″ header_4_font_size=”81px” header_4_line_height=”0.8em” max_width=”580px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”58px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

So, why are we talking about porn?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Quote” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”10px||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Porn’s everywhere – whether you see it over a mate’s shoulder, in a pop up or watch it regularly on your phone, it’s just a click away. Most young people have seen at least some porn – but it’s fair to say most adults are pretty awkward when it comes to talking about it. So, we decided it was time to start the conversation…

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”width: 35% !important;||” custom_padding__hover=”|||” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”width: 100% !important;||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_line_height=”1.6em” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

But isn’t porn normal?

Well – yes and no. Porn’s not new, but online porn is super different from what used to be because of the internet. Now you simply turn on a device and within seconds, you can see a smorgasbord of free, full on X-rated pornos.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”width: 35% !important;||” custom_padding__hover=”|||” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”width: 100% !important;||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_line_height=”1.6em” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]So what’s the big deal with it?

Back in the day, most sex ed was learnt through your ‘village’ – at school, at home or through friends at school. But nowadays, most young people learn more about sex from porn. So with giant porn companies taking over as a sex ed teacher, it’s probably time we actually started talking and asking some important questions.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”max-width: 20%;||float: right;” custom_padding__hover=”|||” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”width: 100% !important;||”][et_pb_text module_class=”col-quote-block” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default”]

“It probably won’t go as smoothly as in the videos.”
NZ Female, 16 yrs (46)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ background_color=”rgba(191,154,70,0.39)” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_center” background_blend=”multiply” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_font=”Zooja Pro||||||||” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_font_size=”50px” text_line_height=”1.2em” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Zooja Pro||||||||” header_4_font_size=”50px” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”39px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”0.9em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone”]

At the end of the day everyone wants great sex,
so we need to ask ourselves…

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Youth-Questions-5.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_center” background_blend=”multiply” custom_margin=”||10px|” custom_padding=”||35vh||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||25vh||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||15vh||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ transform_rotate=”0deg|0deg|-6deg”]

Is porn a legit educator?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ transform_rotate=”0deg|0deg|3deg”]

Does porn teach us how to have good sex?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ transform_rotate=”0deg|0deg|-3deg”]

What is porn actually teaching us about sex?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ transform_rotate=”0deg|0deg|6deg”]

Can watching porn affect our sex life, relationships & mental health?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ custom_padding=”0|0px|0px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ background_color=”#4B858E” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”25px|25px|25px|25px” custom_css_main_element=”text-align: center; ||margin-top:-100px;” border_color_all=”#ffffff”]

I think the most important thing is making sure that we get a great sex education from somewhere that is a reliable source and not just two weird people making sex noises on screen.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_font_size=”14px” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

— NZ male, 17 yrs (46)

excerpt.rendered: YouthHe korero mo ngā Rangatahi! – For Young People!Kia ora, talofa lava, bula, salaam alaikum, Malo e lelei. hey there…So, why are we talking about porn?Porn’s everywhere – whether you see it over a mate’s shoulder, in a pop up or watch it regularly on your phone, it’s just a click away.
